text: The men's lightweight double sculls competition at the 2018 World Rowing Championships in Plovdiv took place at the Plovdiv Regatta Venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 9 September 2018 || 15:32 || Heats |- | Monday 10 September 2018 || 12:33 || Repechage |- | Wednesday 12 September 2018 || 15:02 || Quarterfinals |- | rowspan=2|Thursday 13 September 2018 || 11:54 || Semifinals A/B |- | 15:17 || Semifinals C/D |- | rowspan=5|Saturday 15 September 2018 || 10:02 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 12:16 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |- | 15:09 || Final C |- | 15:57 || Final D |- | 16:37 || Final E |} All times are Eastern European Summer Time (UTC+3) ==Results== ===Heats=== The four fastest boats in each heat advanced directly to the quarterfinals.
